# POST /v1/appEventLocalizations | Apple Developer Documentation

Web Service Endpoint# POST /v1/appEventLocalizations

App Store Connect API 1.7+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/POST-v1-appEventLocalizations#url)



```
POST https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appEventLocalizations
```

## [HTTP Body](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/POST-v1-appEventLocalizations#http-body)

`[AppEventLocalizationCreateRequest`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appeventlocalizationcreaterequest)

 Content-Type: application/json ## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/POST-v1-appEventLocalizations#response-codes)

` 201 Created``[AppEventLocalizationResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appeventlocalizationresponse)`Created`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 409 Conflict``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Conflict`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 422 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`` Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/POST-v1-appEventLocalizations#see-also)
